name: Grandma got run over by a reindeer
name_original: Grandma got run over by a reindeer
description:
Grandma Got Run over by a Reindeer

Made for KuriusHacks: CE 2021 by DONT DIE THANK YOU#9747, sea lion#1175, and ʚ pho ɞ#8394. Code checkable here.

Inspired by Elmo & Patsy's song with the same name, Grandma Got Run over by a Reindeer is an endless runner game filled with Christmas cheer! Run, jump and smash snowmen to escape the over-excited reindeer!

How to play
  • Press the up and down arrow keys to move.
  • Press the space bar to jump.
  • Press the S key to smash.

For more information, check the how to play menu in the game itself :)

Assets used
